title: Sleeper Shoulder position

# Positional release {#positional-release}

- Patient positioned in **supine**
- Stand on the patient's ipsilateral side facing their feet
- Bend the elbow to 90&deg; flexion
- Bring the shoulder to 90&deg; abduction and maintain that position by supporting the patient's elbow with your thigh
- Place one hand on the patient's shoulder to maintain depression and retraction
